name: Lizerne de la Mare
description:
Canyon in two parts, first one similar to what you will find in Flims, but in less interesting. Second part a bit more commited and cut in, but not the nicest limestone.

Approach

From the parking walk up the path to Miex, from there it goes down a few meters before reaching the start of the canyon.

Descent

At the start you walk 100m, followed by 2 rappels in nice pools (not deep) before it gets less interesting. On the lower part, 7 rappels of 10-30m not completely vertical through the deepest section of the canyon. In between there is a 500m walk.

Exit

5 min of walking in the riverbed before reaching the hiking trail. From there another 15min to get back to the car.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Picture Credit : Alex Arnold

Background

One of the new canyons in the regions, first descent in october 2021.
